rows.label: tlk70000019_03_msg0001
rows.name:
Laura-sama, I was surprised to
hear that you'd been knighted!

rows.label: tlk70000019_03_msg0002
rows.name:
Then again, if anyone deserved to be
knighted it was you. You risked your
life to protect us from the Holy Grail.

rows.label: tlk70000019_03_msg0003
rows.name:
I think this country would be
a better place if there were
more women like you around.

rows.label: tlk70000019_03_msg0004
rows.name:
These days men can't be relied
on to do diddly-squat.

rows.label: tlk70000019_03_msg0005
rows.name:
You're ten times as strong
as my husband. No, make that
a hundred times as strong!

rows.label: tlk70000019_03_msg0006
rows.name: Ahaha, listen to me rambling on!
